calculations.name: proj bal2
calculations.tableau_expression: IF [Maturity Date]>[date series] AND [Start date]<=[date series] AND  [Source]<>"EUROCLEAR" AND [R/Rr (non repos)]="Repo" AND INT([Is Internal ?])<>1 THEN ([Initial Cash USD T]) ELSE 0 END

calculation_context.Expression: IF [Maturity Date]>[date series] AND [Start date]<=[date series] AND  [Source]<>"EUROCLEAR" AND [R/Rr (non repos)]="Repo" AND INT([Is Internal ?])<>1 THEN ([Initial Cash USD T]) ELSE 0 END

calculated_fields.Initial Cash USD T:
if [Parameters].[Use Custom Date] then 
    (if [Max Date]= [RpDate] THEN [Ut. US MM] else 0 END)
else if [RpDate]= [Parameters].[End Date] then [Ut. US MM] else 0 END END
calculated_fields.title date: if [Parameters].[Use Custom Date] THEN [Max Date] ELSE  [Parameters].[End Date] END
calculated_fields.Max Date:
case datepart('weekday',today())
    when 1 then today()-2
    when 2 then today()-3
    else today()-1
    END
